creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: the busts of two kabuki actors, each in separate vignette overlapping tree limb in background with pink flowers and leaves; top figure has fierce blue lines painted on face, two black dots over eyebrows, long hair, golden hat, and is frowning; lower figure has checkered robe, large black hat, red makeup arcing over eyes
medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper
title: Four Kabuki Actors
